text: Bastutah yadera antare roga rayeche, taderake apani dekhabena, daure giye tadera'i madhye prabesa kare. Tara baleh amara asanka kari, pache na amara kona durghatanaya patita ha'i. Ata'eba, sedina dure naya, yedina allaha taâ€™ala bijaya prakasa karabena athaba nijera paksa theke kona nirdesa debena-phale tara sbiya gopana manobhabera jan'ye anutapta habe.
